metaproplugin.name: Metapro Plugin
metaproplugin.description: Metapro Plugin addon for Web3 connection, user management, and leaderboard integration.

users-service-api-url.name: Users Service API URL
users-service-api-url.desc: The URL of the Users Service API used by the Metapro system.

project-id.name: Project ID
project-id.desc: The unique identifier for your project in Metapro.

leaderboard-id.name: Leaderboard ID
leaderboard-id.desc: The ID of the leaderboard used in the Metapro system.

referral-leaderboard-id.name: Referral leaderboard ID
referral-leaderboard-id.desc: The ID of the referral leaderboard used in the Metapro system.

leaderboard-api-key.name: Leaderboard API Key
leaderboard-api-key.desc: The API key required to access the leaderboard.

leaderboard-api-url.name: Leaderboard API URL
leaderboard-api-url.desc: The URL of the Leaderboard API used in the Metapro system.

referral-api-url.name: Referral API URL
referral-api-url.desc: The URL of the Referral API used in the Metapro system.

nft-api-url.name: Nft API URL
nft-api-url.desc: The URL of the Nft API used in the Metapro system.

on-account-received.description: Triggered when the user's Ethereum account is successfully retrieved.

on-user-logged-in.display-text: When a user is logged in
on-user-logged-in.description: Triggered when the user is successfully logged in.

on-leaderboard-received.description: Triggered when leaderboard data is successfully retrieved.

on-username-updated.description: Triggered when username is successfully updated.

on-avatar-updated.description: Triggered when avatar is successfully updated.

on-is-registered.description: Triggered when it is confirmed that the user is registered in the system.

on-is-not-registered.display-text: When the user is not registered.
on-is-not-registered.description: Triggered when it is confirmed that the user is not registered in the system.

on-user-score-received.display-text: When user scores data is received.
on-user-score-received.description: Triggered if scores data is successfully received.

on-referral-code-exists.description: Triggered if referral data is successfully received and user has assigned referral code.

on-referral-code-empty.display-text: When user's referral code is empty.
on-referral-code-empty.description: Triggered if referral data is successfully received and user doesn't have referral code.

on-referral-code-generated.display-text: Triggered when the user's referral code is generated.
on-referral-code-generated.description: Triggered when a new referral code is successfully generated for the user.

on-referral-structure-received.display-text: Triggered when the user's referral structure is received.
on-referral-structure-received.description: Triggered when the referral structure data is successfully received.

on-error.description: Triggered when an error occurs during any plugin operation.

on-best-score-received.display-text: Triggered when the user's best score is received.
on-best-score-received.description: Triggered when the best score data for the user is successfully retrieved.

on-best-scores-leaderboard-received.display-text: Triggered when the best scores leaderboard is received.
on-best-scores-leaderboard-received.description: Triggered when the best scores leaderboard data is successfully retrieved.

on-referral-leaderboard-received.display-text: Triggered when the referral leaderboard is received.
on-referral-leaderboard-received.description: Triggered when the referral leaderboard data is successfully retrieved.

on-transaction-sent.display-text: Triggered when a transaction is sent.
on-transaction-sent.description: Triggered when a transaction is successfully sent and the transaction hash is received.

on-number-of-runs-received.display-text: Triggered when the number of runs is received.
on-number-of-runs-received.description: Triggered when the total number of runs for the user is successfully retrieved.

on-ref-code-from-deeplink-exists.list-name: On Referral Code from Deeplink Exists
on-ref-code-from-deeplink-exists.display-text: Triggered when the referral code from the deeplink exists.
on-ref-code-from-deeplink-exists.description: Triggered when a referral code is successfully retrieved from the provided deeplink.

on-read-contract-data-received.display-text: Triggered when the contract data is received.
on-read-contract-data-received.description: Triggered when data from the smart contract is successfully retrieved and read.

request-account.description: Requests the user's Ethereum account from the connected wallet.

login.display-text: Login user with referral settings ID {0}, referral code {1}, and rules checked {2}
login.description: Logs in the user using their Ethereum account. Optionally includes a referral code and checks if rules are accepted.

referral-settings-id.name: Referral Settings ID
referral-settings-id.desc: The ID for the referral settings configured in the project.

referral-code.name: Referral Code
referral-code.desc: The referral code provided by the user, if any.

rules-checked.name: Rules Checked
rules-checked.desc: Indicates whether the user has accepted the rules.

request-leaderboard.display-text: Request leaderboard with limit {0}, minimum balance {1} and maximum balance {2}
request-leaderboard.description: Requests leaderboard data for a specific score range with a defined limit.

limit.name: Limit
limit.desc: The maximum number of leaderboard entries to retrieve.

score.name: Score
score.desc: The score value to be updated for the user.

check-if-registered.display-text: Check if user is already registered.
check-if-registered.description: Checks if the user's account is already registered in the system.

request-user-score.description: Requests user current and total score within provided leaderboard.

fetch-referral-code.description: Requests user's referral code from referral system.

generate-referral-code.display-text: Generate a referral code for the user.
generate-referral-code.description: Generates a unique referral code associated with the user's userId.

request-referral-structure.display-text: Request the referral structure for the user.
request-referral-structure.description: Retrieves the referral downline structure, including level, total score, user count, and percentage of each level in the referral system.

add-score.description: Add a new entry score for user.

score.name: Score
score.desc: The score earned by the user.

request-best-score.display-text: Request the best score for the user for map {0}.
request-best-score.description: Retrieves the highest score achieved by the user.

request-best-scores-leaderboard-by-map-i.display-text: Request the best scores leaderboard for map {0} with limit {1}
request-best-scores-leaderboard-by-map-i.description: Requests the leaderboard data showing the best scores for a specific map, with an optional limit.

limit.name: Limit
limit.desc: The maximum number of leaderboard entries to retrieve.

request-referral-leaderboard.display-text: Request referral leaderboard with ID {0}, API key {1}, limit {2}, minimum balance {3}, and maximum balance {4}
request-referral-leaderboard.description: Requests referral leaderboard data for a specific score range with a defined limit.

ref-leaderboard-id.name: Referral Leaderboard ID
ref-leaderboard-id.desc: The unique identifier for the referral leaderboard.

ref-leaderboard-api-key.name: Referral Leaderboard API Key
ref-leaderboard-api-key.desc: The API key required to access the referral leaderboard.

limit.name: Limit
limit.desc: The maximum number of leaderboard entries to retrieve.

send-contract-transaction.display-text: Send a transaction to the contract at address {0} using the ABI {1}, function {2}, with input data {3}, on chain ID {4}.
send-contract-transaction.description: Sends a transaction to interact with a smart contract at the specified address using the provided ABI, function name, input data, and target chain ID.

abi.name: ABI
abi.desc: A JSON stringified representation of the ABI (Application Binary Interface).

function-name.name: Function Name
function-name.desc: The name of the function being called in the ABI, provided as a JSON stringified representation.

input-data.name: Input Data
input-data.desc: A JSON stringified representation of the input data required for the function call. Example format: "{'_to':'123','_tokenId':1,'_amount':1}".

chain-id.name: Chain ID
chain-id.desc: The target chain ID in decimals.

request-number-of-runs.display-text: Request the number of runs for map {0}
request-number-of-runs.description: Retrieve the number of runs or attempts made for a specific map.

map-id.name: Map ID
map-id.desc: The unique identifier of the map (optional).

check-referral-code-from-deeplink.display-text: Check if a referral code exists in the provided deeplink.
check-referral-code-from-deeplink.description: Validates and checks if a referral code is present in a given deeplink.

read-contract.display-text: Read data from the contract at address {0} using the ABI {1}, function {2}, with input data {3}, on chain ID {4}.
read-contract.description: Reads data from a smart contract at the specified address using the provided ABI, function name, input data, and target chain ID.

abi.name: ABI
abi.desc: A JSON stringified representation of the ABI (Application Binary Interface).

function-name.name: Function Name
function-name.desc: The name of the function being called in the ABI, provided as a JSON stringified representation.

input-data.name: Input Data
input-data.desc: A JSON stringified representation of the input data required for the function call. Example format: "{'_to':'123','_tokenId':1,'_amount':1}".

rpc-url.name: RPC URL
rpc-url.desc: The URL of the Remote Procedure Call (RPC) endpoint for interacting with the blockchain.

get-account.description: Get the current user's Ethereum account.

get-access-token.description: Get the user's Web3 access token.

get-referral-structure.description: Get the user's referral downline structure.

get-best-scores-leaderboard.description: Get the leaderboard showing the user's highest scores.

get-referral-leaderboard.description: Get the leaderboard showing the user's referral-based scores.

get-last-transaction-hash.description: Get the hash of the most recent transaction sent by the plugin.

get-number-of-runs.description: Get the total number of runs for the user.

get-last-error.description: Get the most recent error message encountered by the plugin.

get-project-id.description: Get the project ID associated with the current session.

get-leaderboard-id.description: Get the leaderboard ID associated with the current project.

get-leaderboard-api-key.description: Get the API key for accessing the leaderboard services.

get-users-service-api-url.description: Get the URL for accessing the user service API.

get-leaderboard-api-url.description: Get the URL for accessing the leaderboard API.

get-referral-api-url.description: Get the API URL for referral services.

get-platform-id.description: Get the platform ID for the current project.

get-ref-code-from-deeplink.description: Get the referral code from the provided deeplink.

get-last-read-contract-data.description: Get the data returned from the last read contract interaction.
